Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: THE LAST TIGHTROPE DANCER OF ARMENIA
Clip.Episode: The Last Tightrope Dancer of Armenia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The two most celebrated tightrope dancers in Armenia are now in their 80s. Now they share the same hope -- that the only remaining tightrope student will carry on their life's work. But will 17 year old orphan Hovsep want to accept the responsibility?

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Emmanuelle embarks upon the mythic railroad line which runs across the valleys of Brahmaputra and the Ganges.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Despite threats, Father Daniel Vogt stands with Mexico's native Quechi as they struggle to acquire legal title to their ancestral land.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev John Fife scours the desert giving aid to undocumented migrants crossing into America through the life-endangering Sonora Desert.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: SECRETS OF THE TAJ MAHAL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: It is considered a wonder of the world, and one of the most popular tourist attractions on Earth, but few realize that the Taj Mahal was built as a monument to eternal love.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Naples, the city that fascinates through its music, its thousand churches, its traditions and tastes. Between present and past the ancient origins of this land that makes Italy known worldwide are reflected in the blue waters of the charming tirrenian coasts.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Dr. Jessie wants to harness the energy of the wind to produce energy systems for small scale application; " A turbine on every farm." Change is in the wind as he blazes a trail through the prairies and onto the international stage.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: SETI: Planet Hunters, The New Search for ET and Quest Lab: Aerogel
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Do other planets like Earth exist? Find out why a team of astronomers in the US has built a new telescope to look for planets outside our solar system. And, is anyone out there? Find out why SETI scientists now say we might be hearing from ET sooner than you think. And, Aerogel is a unique man made substance that insulates space suits, makes tennis rackets stronger and could be used one day to clean up oil spills.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Disappearing Frogs, The Lost Salmon and Why I Do Science: Bob Drewes
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Pollution, disease and climate change are threatening frogs around the world. And for the first time ever, a sharp decline in salmon numbers prompted officials to cancel an entire fishing season in 2008 in the ocean off the Western United States. Where did the salmon go? Finally, meet herpetologist Bob Drewes and find out how he turned his passion for frogs into a lifelong career.

Clip.Title: RESURRECTION SCIENCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is the story of science's latest frontier: a global scientific investigation into DNA sequencing and bio-molecular cloning, to understand how scientists around the world are competing to be the first to rewrite the history of our planet and resurrect creatures from the past.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.
